channel.description: Recent content in XML on ultinomics.org

item.title: xmltools package to help convert XML data to tidy data frames
item.description: I created a new, small package called xmltools that helps simplify the process of converting XML data into tidy data frames. It has not yet been tested on a ton of XML files so it may have some bugs. I also have not created any tests. But, at least for me, it helps drastically cut down on the code I have to write to get the data I want from an XML file.
